Original:
首先來說說一進門就有鎮店之寶～～「小灰貓」迎接，格外的討喜，在喝酒期間，🐱也會像是巡店一般穿梭酒桌之間，像極了店公關，生怕大家無法融入他們店裡。
這家店提供了咖啡、酒精、一些簡單的餐點，室內有一、二樓可供選擇，還有戶外的座位。
再來，全店無實體菜單，以電子菜單的形式，上官方IG搜尋查看。我點了兩杯店內特色調酒，一杯屬於偏濃酒感濃烈「滾床單」，另一杯是清爽系列，以茶酒為主的「鳳茶」。
滾床單可能因為裡面的艾碧斯基酒，所以尚有一股較刺激味蕾的味道在中後段會跑出來，整體算是好喝，只是無法一口接一口。
鳳茶是以綠茶為底，加上鳳梨風味，整體喝起來偏甜易入口，由於酒精濃度不高。

‼️如果先飲一口鳳茶，立刻喝下滾床單，前述的較刺激味蕾的感覺會瞬間消失，讓滾床單非常非常順口，讓你可以有清爽感，又有濃烈的酒精，買醉首選組合！
😉推薦組合「鳳茶」+「滾床單」
EN:
First of all, as soon as you enter the door, there will be a treasure of the town shop ~~ "Little Gray Cat" is welcome. It is particularly pleasing. During drinking, it will also be like the shuttle shop. I'm afraid that everyone can not be integrated into their shop.
This shop offers coffee, alcohol, and some simple meals. There are first or second floors to choose from, and outdoor seats.
Then, there is no physical menu in the whole store. In the form of an electronic menu, the official IG search for viewing.I ordered two cups of special bartending in the shop. One cup belongs to a strong "rolling sheet", and the other is a refreshing series.
The rolling sheets may be because the Aijisky wine inside, so there is still a smell of stimulating taste buds that will run out in the middle and rear sections. The overall is delicious, but it is not possible to take a bite.
Phoenix tea is based on green tea and pineapple flavor. The overall drink is sweet and easy to enter, because the alcohol concentration is not high.

Bleak️ If you drink a bite of phoenix first and drink the rolling sheets immediately, the more stimulating taste buds in the aforemention will disappear instantly, making the rolling sheets very smooth, so that you can have a refreshing, strong alcohol, buy drunk first choice combination!
Recommend the combination "Phoenix Tea"+"Rolling Sheets"

Original:
🌟進入前要上一層樓梯，樓梯在「藍儂說」旁！
🔸滷牛筋($250)：非一般常見的滷到軟爛的口感，而是具有Q度、嚼勁、紮實的口感，滷的相當入味，單吃原味就越嚼越香，如果敢吃辣可以搭配隨附的辣椒醬油，香味直接再升級，是很適合當下酒菜的餐點！推！
🔸雞米花($120)：這裡的雞米花比麥克雞塊還大塊，比想像中的大塊很多，外皮炸起來酥脆、裡面雞肉也是嫩的，令人驚艷！推！
🔸洋蔥圈($120)：比起前面兩道餐點，洋蔥圈顯得中規中矩，和市面上的洋蔥圈差不多。
🔹桃太郎(無酒精)($250)：口味酸酸甜甜很順口，比外面很多酸到不行的水果茶都還好喝，我和同行的兩位女生都覺得這杯很讚，沒喝酒的人可嘗試！推！
🔹滾床單(有酒精)($380)：我本人沒喝到，但朋友說一開始喝覺得有點濃，冰塊融化後才變比較順口，她唯一覺得美中不足的地方是感覺有點沈澱物。
🔹極光(有酒精)($380)：我本人沒喝到，但朋友一喝就說喉嚨感覺燒起來了，她最後只喝了半杯，是一杯很烈的酒。
🟡店員服務態度都很優良，尤其在結帳時有個左手臂有花花刺青的女店員有善意提醒下次可以請她們介紹，才不會點到不適合自己的飲料！店內空間小坐起來蠻擁擠的；二樓燈光過於昏暗，想拍照或看菜色還要自行用手機打光；另外建議冷氣都要調整一下風向，不要對著客人的頭送風。
EN:
Before entering, you have to take the stairs on the first floor, and the stairs are next to "Lan Nong"!
$ Journal beef tendon ($ 250): It is not common to soften and rotten, but has a Q degree, chewy, solid taste. It can be paired with the pepper soy sauce that is attached, and the fragrance is upgraded directly, which is very suitable for the meal for the current wine and vegetables!push!
$ Chicken rice flower ($ 120): The chicken rice flowers here are larger than the Mike chicken nuggets, which is much larger than the imagination. The skin is crispy and the chicken inside is also tender, which is amazing!push!
$ Onion ring ($ 120): Compared with the two meals in the previous two, the onion ring is quite satisfactory, similar to the onion ring on the market.
酒 🔹 🔹 🔹 (no alcohol) ($ 250): The taste is sour and sweet, and it is better than the fruit tea that is not sour outside. Try!push!
酒 Rolling sheets (with alcohol) ($ 380): I did n’t drink it, but my friend said that it felt a bit strong at first, and it became smooth after the ice cubes melted. The only thing she felt in the United States felt a bit precipitated.
) Aurora (with alcohol) ($ 380): I didn't drink it, but when my friend drank it, he said that his throat felt burned. She only drank half a cup in the end. It was a very strong wine.
The service attitude of the clerk is very good, especially at the time of checkout, there is a female clerk with a left arm with tattoos.
